Class Project

java.lang.Object
Project
public class Project extends Object
This class creates Project objects that contain all information about each project.

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      Project(ProjectInfo projectInfo, Person architect, Person contractor, Person customer, Person engineer, Person manager)
      The constructor for the Project class passes information about a project - this includes four objects.
      Parameters:
      projectInfo - An object from the ProjectInfo class
      architect - An object from the Person class with an Architect type
      contractor - An object from the Person class with a Contractor type
      customer - An object from the Person class with a Customer type

  • Method Details

    • setFinalise

      public void setFinalise(boolean finalise)
      Finalises the project
      Parameters:
      finalise - boolean is passed of whether the project has been finalised or not.

    • createInvoice

      public String createInvoice()
      This method is called when a project is finalised and an invoice needs to be created.
      Returns:
      a string of the invoice is returned.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
